qas.question: Which prime minister was appointed only one time?
When was Thatcher appointed prime minister?
When did Thatcher last hold power?
What did Margaret Thatcher reconfigure following each general election?
What leader of the cabinet has a limeted term?
What Prime Minister was appointed multiple times?

context: Most <b4_0>prime ministers<b4_0/> in parliamentary systems are not appointed for a specific term in office and in effect may remain in power through a number of elections and parliaments. For example, <a0_0><b5_0>Margaret Thatcher<b5_0/><a0_0/> was only ever appointed prime minister on one occasion, in <a1_0>1979<a1_0/>. She remained continuously in power until <a2_0>1990<a2_0/>, though she used the assembly of each House of Commons after a general election to reshuffle her <a3_0>cabinet<a3_0/>.
